channel.title: Changing the color of objects (trees)
channel.description:
Greetings all!
I create bots for RSPS', and I find it would be a hell of a lot easier if I could change the color of certain objects, such as a tree.
I use Pascal language (with Simba program) to create color oriented bots, and although I can use DTM's and other functions to help find if I'm clicking the right object, it would simplify all my code if I could change the color of a whole tree to lets say red, and have the bot search for that color.
tl;dr
How can I change the color of objects such as trees, ores, etc.?
Thanks!
